trans-unit.source: Controls playback of a sound from a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller avspilling av en lyd fra en WAV-fil.

trans-unit.source: The SoundPlayer class provides a simple interface for loading and playing a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SoundPlayer har et enkelt grensesnitt for lasting og å spille en WAV-fil.

trans-unit.source: The SoundPlayer class supports loading a .wav file from a file path, a URL, a <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains a .wav file, or an embedded resource that contains a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SoundPlayer støtter innlasting av en WAV-fil fra en filbane, en URL-adresse, en <xref:System.IO.Stream>som inneholder en WAV-fil, eller en innebygd ressurs som inneholder en WAV-fil.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: To play a sound using the SoundPlayer class, configure a SoundPlayer with a path to the .wav file and call one of the play methods.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurere en SoundPlayer med en bane til WAV-fil for å spille lyd ved hjelp av SoundPlayer klassen, og kall én av metodene play.

trans-unit.source: You can identify the .wav file to play by using one of the constructors or by setting either the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A> or <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan finne filen WAV å spille ved hjelp av én av konstruktører eller ved å angi enten den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A>eller <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file can be loaded prior to playing by using one of the load methods, or loading can be deferred until one of the play methods is called.
trans-unit.target: Filen kan lastes før spille ved hjelp av én av metodene Last inn eller innlasting kan utsettes til én av metodene play kalles.

trans-unit.source: A SoundPlayer configured to load a .wav file from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or URL must load the .wav file into memory before playback begins.
trans-unit.target: En SoundPlayer som er konfigurert til å laste inn en WAV-fil fra en <xref:System.IO.Stream>eller URL-adressen må lastes inn i WAV-fil i minnet før avspilling starter.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: You can load or play a .wav file synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste inn eller spille av en WAV synkron eller asynkron.

trans-unit.source: If you call a synchronous load or play method, the calling thread will wait until the method returns, which may cause painting and other events to be interrupted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kalle en synkron belastning eller spiller metoden, vente kall tråden før den returnerer metoden, som kan føre til at male og andre hendelser avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: Calling an asynchronous load or play method will allow the calling thread to continue without interruption.
trans-unit.target: Kaller en asynkron innlasting eller play metoden tillater kall tråden fortsette uten avbrudd.

trans-unit.source: For more information on asynchronous method calls, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om asynkrone metodekall, se [slik: kjøre en operasjon i bakgrunnen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When a SoundPlayer has finished loading a .wav file, it raises the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Når en SoundPlayer innlasting av en WAV-fil er fullført, den opphøyer den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> in your event handler to determine if the load succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>i hendelsesbehandlingen å finne ut om belastningen var vellykket eller mislykket.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocationChanged> event is raised when the audio source is set to a new file path or URL.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocationChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når lyd kilden er satt til en ny filbane eller URL-adresse.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocationChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.StreamChanged> event is raised when the audio source is set to a new <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.StreamChanged>Denne hendelsen oppstår når lyd kilden er satt til en ny <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.StreamChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For more information about SoundPlayer, see [SoundPlayer Class Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om SoundPlayer [SoundPlayer klassen oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SoundPlayer class cannot play other file types, such as .wma or .mp3.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For SoundPlayer klassen kan ikke spille andre filtyper, for eksempel WMA- eller MP3.

trans-unit.source: If you want to play other file types, you can use the Windows Media Player control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å spille andre filtyper, kan du bruke kan kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the Windows Media Player Control in a .NET Framework Solution](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) and [Windows Media Player Object Model Reference for Visual Basic .NET and C#](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) in the Windows Media Player SDK.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [bruker Windows Media Player kontroll i en .NET Framework-løsning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) og [Windows Media Player modellen objektreferanse for Visual Basic .NET og C#](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) i Windows Media Player SDK.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> with no audio source.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>uten lyd kilde.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: Until it is configured with an audio source path, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> will play a beep sound when one of its playback methods is called.
trans-unit.target: Før den er konfigurert med en lyd kildebane den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>spilles av et lydsignal lydfil når én av metodene avspilling kalles.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> class, and attaches the .wav file within the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> klasse og legger WAV-filen i den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed to the `stream` parameter should be a <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.Stream>sendt til den `stream` -parameteren må være en <xref:System.IO.Stream>som inneholder en WAV-fil.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The data returned by the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> should be the data within a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som ble returnert av den <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.IO.Stream>skal dataene i WAV-fil.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>til en WAV-fil.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> class, and attaches the specified .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> klasse og legger det angitte WAV-fil.

trans-unit.source: The string passed to the `soundLocation` parameter can be either a file path or a URL to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som ble sendt til den `soundLocation` parameteren kan være en filbane eller en URL-adresse til en WAV-fil.

trans-unit.source: If the path or URL is not valid, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> will still be constructed, but subsequent calls to a load or play method will fail.
trans-unit.target: Hvis banen eller URL-adressen ikke er gyldig i <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>vil fremdeles være konstruert, men etterfølgende kall til en belastning eller play-metoden mislykkes.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: The location of a .wav file to load.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av en WAV-fil for å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: The URL value specified by soundLocation cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: URL-verdien som er angitt av soundLocation kan ikke løses.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet som skal brukes for deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: The specified in serializationInfo cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Den angitt i serializationInfo kan ikke løses.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether loading of a .wav file has successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om innlasting av en WAV-fil er fullført.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a .wav file is loaded; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a .wav file has not yet been loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en WAV-fil er lastet inn; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis en WAV-fil ikke er lastet.

trans-unit.source: Loads a sound synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en lyd synkront.

trans-unit.source: The Load method uses the current thread to load a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Last inn bruker gjeldende tråd for å laste inn en WAV-fil, hindrer at tråden behandler andre meldinger til belastningen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The Load method may produce a delay while loading a large .wav file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Den Versjonsuavhengige innlastingsmetoden kan gi en forsinkelse under innlasting av en stor WAV-fil.

trans-unit.source: In addition, painting and other events will be blocked until the load is completed.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg bli male og andre hendelser blokkert inntil belastningen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A> method to load a sound asynchronously, which allows the calling thread to continue without interruption.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>metode for å laste inn en lyd asynkront, som tillater at kall tråden fortsette uten avbrudd.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted> event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>hendelse under innlasting av er fullført, selv om belastningen ikke var vellykket.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid det skal gå under innlasting av overskrider ønsket tid i millisekunder, angitt av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Loads a .wav file from a stream or a Web resource using a new thread.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en WAV-fil fra en dataflyt eller en webressursen ved hjelp av en ny tråd.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> is configured to load a .wav file from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or Web resource, this method begins loading a .wav file from the location using a new thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er konfigurert til å laste inn en WAV-fil fra en <xref:System.IO.Stream>eller nettressursen, denne metoden begynner under innlasting av en WAV-fil fra plasseringen ved hjelp av en ny tråd.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted> event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>hendelse under innlasting av er fullført, selv om belastningen ikke var vellykket.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> is configured to load a .wav file from a local file path, this method does nothing, because loading is deferred until playing begins.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er konfigurert for å laste inn en WAV-fil fra en lokal filbane, denne metoden støtter ingenting, fordi innlasting er utsatt til å spille begynner.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous loading, see [How to: Load a Sound Asynchronously within a Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om asynkron innlasting [slik: laste inn en lyd asynkront i Windows-skjema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid det skal gå under innlasting av overskrider ønsket tid i millisekunder, angitt av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a .wav file has been successfully or unsuccessfully loaded.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en WAV-fil er fullført eller mislykkes lastet.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when loading of a .wav file is complete.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under innlasting av en WAV-fil er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate whether the load of the sound was completed successfully or failed.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene hendelsen angi om innlasting av lyden ble fullført eller mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, in which the .wav file must load.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden i millisekunder, der WAV-fil må lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: After this time has expired, the loading is canceled and a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Etter dette tidspunktet er utløpt, innlasting er avbrutt og en <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException>unntak.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait.
trans-unit.target: Antall millisekunder det skal ventes.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10000 (10 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 10000 (10 sekunder).

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when loading of a .wav file is complete.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når innlasting av en WAV-fil er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnLoadCompleted method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnLoadCompleted kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocationChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a new audio source path for this <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en ny lyd kildebane for denne <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er angitt.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see How to: Provide Event functionality and [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se slik: Angi hendelsen funksjonalitet og [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSoundLocationChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSoundLocationChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.StreamChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer.StreamChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a new <xref:System.IO.Stream> audio source for this <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en ny <xref:System.IO.Stream>lyd kilden til denne <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er angitt.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnStreamChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnStreamChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Plays the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Spiller WAV-filen med en ny tråd og laster WAV-fil hvis den ikke er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: The Play method plays the sound using a new thread.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Play spiller lyd ved hjelp av en ny tråd.

trans-unit.source: If you call Play before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller Play før WAV-fil er lastet inn i minnet, WAV-fil vil bli lastet inn før avspilling starter.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> method to load the .wav file to memory in advance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>eller <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A>metode for å laste inn filen WAV til minne på forhånd.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or URL, future calls to playback methods for the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes.
trans-unit.target: Etter en WAV fil er lastet inn fra en <xref:System.IO.Stream>eller URL-adresse, fremtidige kall til avspilling metoder for den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>trenger ikke å laste inn filen WAV før banen til lydfil endringene.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the Play method will play the default beep sound.
trans-unit.target: Hvis WAV-filen ikke er angitt eller den ikke kan laste inn spilles metoden Play av Standardlyd lydfil.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid det skal gå under innlasting av overskrider ønsket tid i millisekunder, angitt av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> is not a PCM .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Overskriften WAV er skadet. filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>er ikke en PCM WAV-fil.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Plays and loops the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Spiller løkke WAV-fil med en ny tråd og laster WAV-fil hvis den ikke er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: The PlayLooping method plays and loops the sound using a new thread.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PlayLooping spiller og løkke lyden ved hjelp av en ny tråd.

trans-unit.source: If you call PlayLooping before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller PlayLooping før WAV-fil er lastet inn i minnet, WAV-fil vil bli lastet inn før avspilling starter.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> method to load the .wav file to memory in advance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>eller <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A>metode for å laste inn filen WAV til minne på forhånd.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or URL, future calls to playback methods for the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes.
trans-unit.target: Etter en WAV fil er lastet inn fra en <xref:System.IO.Stream>eller URL-adresse, fremtidige kall til avspilling metoder for den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>trenger ikke å laste inn filen WAV før banen til lydfil endringene.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the PlayLooping method will play the default beep sound.
trans-unit.target: Hvis WAV-filen ikke er angitt eller den ikke kan laste inn spilles metoden PlayLooping av Standardlyd lydfil.

trans-unit.source: For more information about PlayLooping, see [How to: Loop a Sound Playing on a Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om PlayLooping [slik: Gjenta en lyd å spille på en Windows-skjema](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid det skal gå under innlasting av overskrider ønsket tid i millisekunder, angitt av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> is not a PCM .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Overskriften WAV er skadet. filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>er ikke en PCM WAV-fil.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Plays the .wav file and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Spiller WAV-filen, og laster WAV-fil hvis den ikke er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: The PlaySync method uses the current thread to play a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PlaySync bruker gjeldende tråd for å spille wav, hindrer at tråden behandler andre meldinger til belastningen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> method to load the .wav file to memory in advance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>eller <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A>metode for å laste inn filen WAV til minne på forhånd.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Load%2A> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> or URL, future calls to playback methods for the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes.
trans-unit.target: Etter en WAV fil er lastet inn fra en <xref:System.IO.Stream>eller URL-adresse, fremtidige kall til avspilling metoder for den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>trenger ikke å laste inn filen WAV før banen til lydfil endringene.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the PlaySync method will play the default beep sound.
trans-unit.target: Hvis WAV-filen ikke er angitt eller den ikke kan laste inn spilles metoden PlaySync av Standardlyd lydfil.

trans-unit.source: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid det skal gå under innlasting av overskrider ønsket tid i millisekunder, angitt av <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.LoadTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*> is not a PCM .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Overskriften WAV er skadet. filen fra <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>er ikke en PCM WAV-fil.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file path or URL of the .wav file to load.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir filbanen eller URL-adresse i WAV-filen for å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> when the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A> property is set to a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>når <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A>egenskapen settes til en <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Stream%2A> </xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The file path or URL from which to load a .wav file, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if no file path is present.
trans-unit.target: Filbanen eller URL-adresse fra å laste inn en WAV-fil, eller <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> Hvis det finnes ingen bane.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new audio source path for this <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en ny lyd kildebane for denne <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> er angitt.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a new audio source path for this <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en ny lyd kildebane for denne <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er angitt.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Stops playback of the sound if playback is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Stopper avspilling av lyden hvis avspilling pågår.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream> from which to load the .wav file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.IO.Stream>fra å laste inn filen WAV.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This property is set to `null` when the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A> property is set to a new and valid sound location.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til `null` når den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A>er satt til en ny og gyldig lydfil plassering.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.SoundLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> from which to load the .wav file, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no stream is available.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>fra å laste inn filen WAV eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new <xref:System.IO.Stream> audio source for this <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en ny <xref:System.IO.Stream>lyd kilden til denne <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref> er angitt.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a new <xref:System.IO.Stream> audio source for this <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> has been set.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en ny <xref:System.IO.Stream>lyd kilden til denne <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>er angitt.</xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet, kan du se den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet (se <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for denne serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om den <xref href="System.Media.SoundPlayer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>
